textBeforeTable: Drops Edit Scarshield Warlock can be found in Blackrock Spire. They are members of the Blackrock Clan's Scarshield Legion. Blackrock Spire Level: 53-55 <Scarshield Legion> Scarshield Warlock See Blackrock Spire Location Alliance Horde Reaction 1 81
